works fine on my PAL Xbox360. No viruses!

1. Extract .iso and .dvd file to an ordinary directory
2. Burn to DVD+R DL with Imgburn(look it up on google) on 2.4 speed
3. Put the disc in your xbox 360 and enjoi ;)

PS: You need at least an Xbox 360 with iXtreme Firmware :)
